'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
Built like a bunker into the side of the fortress, the quarters belonging to [[Fleet Master Okaya]] are nothing to scoff at and are filled with books and an assortment of Rauataian spirits.

==Points of interest==
* Just your usual office. You can raid Okaya's bedroom with impunity in stealth mode.
* A Gunhawk and hawk stand guard near the center of the room.

==Characters==
* [[Fleet Master Okaya]]

==Loot==
* [[Superb Arquebus (Deadfire)|Superb Arquebus]]: In the locked chest in the corner, requiring [[Mechanics]] 6 to open, along with some additional random loot.
